addGuardian(Core.Wallet storage,address).notice: Lets an authorised module add a guardian to a wallet.

getGuardians(Core.Wallet storage).notice: Gets the list of guaridans for a wallet.

guardianCount(Core.Wallet storage).notice: Returns the number of guardians for a wallet.

isGuardian(Core.Wallet storage,address).notice: Checks if an account is a guardian for a wallet.

revokeGuardian(Core.Wallet storage,addre.notice: Lets an authorised module revoke a guardian from a wallet.
